title: Nikki Haley
summary: Nimrata Nikki Haley (n√©e Randhawa; born January 20, 1972[1]) is an American diplomat and politician who served as the 116th and first female governor of South Carolina from 2011 to 2017, and as the 29th United States ambassador to the United Nations for two years, from January 2017 to January 2019.[2]
